overview: Ivan is a young painter employed by a well-known city company. Aware the embezzlement that his boss commits through his paintings, Ivan decides to take him with the old man  to the city inspector to whom this last case is revealed. At the celebration of the company that was declared the company of the year, Jadranko Granula,  Ivan's boss decides to promote Ivana to the ranks of his close associates. However,  the process of initiation catches Ivan unprepared, when he realizes that he killed the inspector with  by which he prepared a conspiracy.
title: Facade
